Calculator

Are you looking to upgrade your wheel & tire package? Are you considering changing some of the properties of your wheels and/or tires?

Here's how it works:

OEM Specs

Tell us what size the car's OEM wheels and tires are. You may also consider properties like your gear ratios or your car's wheelbase for an even more in-depth outlook on your new setup.

New Specs

Tell us what your new setup will look like. Are you looking to try smaller wheels for the winter? A staggered configuration for the track? Significantly larger tires for mudding? Or maybe just as close to OEM as you can find for your classic car?

Comparison

Finally, it's time to pick your new setup. Play around with values like the offset, wheel width and tire sizes. We'll show you how it compares to your OEM setup to give you an idea of how it'll fit on your car in real-time.
